title: Rachel Nichols | Ep 153 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball

description:
ALL THE SMOKE season 4 continues with the heat, as the newest member of the SHOWTIME BASKETBALL family joins Matt and Stak for her first exclusive interview since her departure from ESPN. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
